mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.user_login_id userLoginId, ur.role_id remark FROM tb_user1 u LEFT JOIN tb_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE u.user_login_id = #{userLoginId} AND u.password1 = #{password1} AND u.is_logout = '0'

SELECT rs.resource_id resourceId, rs.resource_url resourceUrl, rs.resource_order resourceOrder, rs.parent_id parentId, rs.resource_desc resourceDesc, rs.resource_title resourceTitle, rs.resource_type resourceType, rs.in_page_name inPageName FROM tb_user_role ur, tb_role r ,tb_role_privilege rp, tb_resource rs WHERE ur.role_id = r.role_id and r.role_id = rp.role_id and rp.resource_id = rs.resource_id and ur.user_id = #{userId} and
rs.resource_type = '1'
rs.resource_type != '1' and rs.parent_id = #{resourceType}
ORDER BY rs.resource_id
